entry.title: Salute to our sis, Fetien and the whole Konjo Ethiopian Food...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Salute to our sis, Fetien and the whole Konjo Ethiopian Food family! #blackiskonjo

Konjo Ethiopian Food is feeling blissful at Konjo Ethiopian Food. ¬∑ Denver

MSU Denver‚Äôs Top 10 Alumni!

Our co-founder Fetien was given an award this past Saturday, in a virtual ceremony honoring the Top 10 Alumni in the past 10 years, ...from MSU!

Fetien graduated from Metropolitan State University with a degree in Marketing and has been dedicated to not only honing her craft but to giving back to the community.

‚ÄúThank you to everyone that has helped us grow and thrive! We are so blessed to be doing what we love, with the support of our community and our loved ones‚Äù.

Help us in congratulating her and to all of the award winners! Thank you MSU Denver Roadrunners!

#MSU #Alumni #Top10 #GetIt #Community #CommunityLove #ThatYellow #Sunshine #Mood #AllTheFeels #Ethiopia #EthiopianWomen #Boss #BossBabe #KonjoEthiopianFood #OnlyTheBeginning

entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280Foothills Regional Housing

We're helping residents of the City of Westminster, that reside within Jefferson County, with their housing payments for those affected by COVID. Please join us... in spreading the news that help is available by sharing on your page. The online application is on our website at: bit.ly/FRHWestminster.

#foothillsregionalhousing #pandemicassistance #housingassistance #help #cityofwestminster
Find us on NextDoor: bit.ly/FRHNextdoor.

entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

EMERGENCY #CALLTOACTION
Family being evicted RIGHT NOW at 14th and Yosemite in Denver
They are in need of all forms of mutual aid - funds, housing, moving of belongings, etc...
Please, if you are able head down there and support! We will be making a monetary donation, and encourage folks to show up however they can for this family.
#mutualaid #crisisintervention

...

entry.title: At the event on Thursday, Apryl Alexander, associate professor...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

At the event on Thursday, Apryl Alexander, associate professor at the University of Denver, stressed that decreasing the state‚Äôs prison population is central to the push for racial justice and the Black Lives Matter movement.

‚ÄúWe are in a pandemic where COVID-19 is disproportionately affecting Black, Indigenous and Latino communities,‚Äù said Alexander, who is also a member of Denver‚Äôs local Black Lives Matter chapter. ‚ÄúWe know that these same communities have been disproportionately affected by mass incarceration and the prison industrial complex.‚Äù

#FreeThemAll

The family of Ronald Johnson ‚Äî a 62-year-old Black grandfather who‚Äôs served 22 years in prison for nonviolent drug offenses ‚Äî worries that his prison sentence might be a death sentence. ‚ÄúIn prison, he can‚Äôt protect himself and he can‚Äôt social distance,‚Äù his daughter Amber said in a sta...

coloradonewsline.com

Advocates push state to resume early prison releases due to coronavirus - Colorado Newsline

The family of Ronald Johnson ‚Äî a 62-year-old Black grandfather who‚Äôs served 22 years in prison for nonviolent drug offenses ‚Äî worries that his prison sentence might be a death sentence. ‚ÄúIn prison, he can‚Äôt protect himself and he can‚Äôt social distance,‚Äù his daughter Amber said in a sta...The family of Ronald Johnson ‚Äî a 62-year-old Black grandfather who‚Äôs served 22 years in prison for nonviolent drug offenses ‚Äî worries that his prison sentence might be a death sentence. ‚ÄúIn prison, he can‚Äôt protect himself and he can‚Äôt social distance,‚Äù his daughter Amber said in a sta...

entry.title: ‚ÄúBeing Black often feels like my mind is straddling past,...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúBeing Black often feels like my mind is straddling past, present, and future all at once. The past never really leaves but rather hangs overhead like a shadow or a picture frame. For a young white person, segregation may seem like a concept buried many years in the past. For me, on the other hand, my own father couldn‚Äôt attend elementary school with white children until the fifth grade.‚Äù

https://saltyworld.net/why-being-black-means-time-is-fluid‚Ä¶/

"What time are we in if it is still not the time of justice?"

saltyworld.net

Why Being Black Means Time is Fluid for Me

"What time are we in if it is still not the time of justice?""What time are we in if it is still not the time of justice?"

entry.title: ‚ñ∂
#DEMANDS...
entry.content:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

entry.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
entry.content:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
